lab.util.commands

Class ServerCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab.util.commands.Command
      • lab.util.commands.ServerCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executable, Loggable, Packable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBCommand

    public abstract class ServerCommand
extends Command
implements Packable
    This class is a base of all server commands classes.
